message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value of costs related to general management and administration from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see there's a line item called "Administrative Expenses" which represents the costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole. The value for this item is 1241966.86.

This is similar to the example given, where "Administrative Expenses" was identified as the relevant cost for general management and administration.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1241966.86'}}
```
